mapper.sql: Id, ParId, MenuName, BeLock, Url, IsButton
mapper.insert: insert into AuthorityMenuClass (ParId, MenuName, BeLock, Url, IsButton) values (#{parid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{menuname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{belock,jdbcType=BIT}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isbutton,jdbcType=BIT})
mapper.select:
DECLARE @roleID INT SELECT @roleID=ISNULL(b.Id,0) FROM dbo.account a left JOIN (select * from AuthorityRole where BeLock=0 ) b ON a.RoleId=b.Id WHERE a.id=#{accountId}
IF @roleID>0 SELECT #{accountId} AS AccoutId , MenuId , ParId , MenuName , ISNULL(Url, '') AS Url , amc.IsButton FROM AuthorityMenuClass amc ( NOLOCK ) JOIN dbo.AuthorityRoleMentMenuSet aam ( NOLOCK ) ON aam.MenuId = amc.Id WHERE aam.RoleId = @roleID and amc.BeLock = CAST(0 AS BIT) ELSE SELECT AccoutId , MenuId , ParId , MenuName , ISNULL(Url, '') AS Url , amc.IsButton FROM AuthorityMenuClass amc ( NOLOCK ) JOIN dbo.AuthorityAccountMenuSet aam ( NOLOCK ) ON aam.MenuId = amc.Id WHERE aam.AccoutId = #{accountId} AND amc.BeLock = CAST(0 AS BIT)

SELECT * , -1 AS accoutid FROM (select * from AuthorityMenuClass a WITH ( NOLOCK )) a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT b.MenuId FROM AuthorityAccountMenuSet b WITH ( NOLOCK ) WHERE b.AccoutId = #{userID} ) t ON a.Id = t.MenuId where a.BeLock = CAST(0 AS BIT)

SELECT *,-1 as accoutid FROM AuthorityMenuClass a WITH ( NOLOCK ) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT b.MenuId FROM AuthorityRoleMentMenuSet b WITH ( NOLOCK ) WHERE b.roleid = #{roleID} ) t ON a.Id = t.MenuId where a.BeLock = CAST(0 AS BIT)
SELECT Id,ParId,MenuName,BeLock,Url,IsButton,JavaUrl FROM AuthorityMenuClass with(nolock) where ParId=#{parId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and BeLock = CAST(0 AS BIT)
SELECT Id,ParId,MenuName,BeLock,Url,IsButton,JavaUrl FROM AuthorityMenuClass with(nolock) where Id=#{Id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
